Essentials Accessibility Service

This service is required for the following advanced features:

• Physical Button Remapping:
Detects volume button presses even when the screen is off to trigger actions like the Flashlight.

• Per-App Settings:
Monitors the currently active app to apply specific profiles for Dynamic Night Light, Notification Lighting Colors, and App Lock.

• Screen Control:
Allows the app to lock the screen (e.g. via Double Tap or Widgets) and detect screen state changes.

• Security:
Prevents unauthorized changes by detecting window content when the device is locked.

No input text or sensitive user data is collected or transmitted.
Disable apps that are rarely used
